transcript:
Customer: Madam.
Executive: Hello. ha Parmeshwar ji, mai Vaishnavi baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se. ha to ek to aapne lead bataya tha sir ki ye Praveen ka hai, wo kharab tha. hai na? wo maine note kar liya hai. dusra jo aap bol rahe hai ki usne saman le liya tha aur aapne call kiya tab tak wo le chuka tha. to isme lead to galat nahi hui na? lead ka matlab hota hai ki humne koi aap aisa keh do ki koi usko jarurat hi nahi thi. aap usko us tarah ke client se aap baat karke bol sakte hai hum bhi ye saman sell karte hai. acche quality ka hai, aap contact me rahiye. aapko dobara jab chahiye hoga to hum aapko denge saman. thik hai? aise bhi aap usse baat kar sakte hai.
Customer: wo to chal pada, koi baat nahi, koi kuch nahi. wo to hum late kiya kal usse. ye dusra wala hai uska kya kare?
Executive: kiska? aur kiska?
Customer: maine abhi aapko bataya na gargi wala, abhi main board me dala.
Executive: ek mai bata rahi hu na, mai aapko ek bylead reverse kar de rahi hu sir. thik hai? aisa hota nahi hai lekin aapke sir aapne mujhse baat chit kiya, sari chije hui, aapko ek mai reverse kar rahi hu. lekin sath hi sath sir mai batana chahungi aap dekhiye online platform pe hai. yaha par kya hota hai na ki bahut sare buyer na mana kar jate hai. unko call aati hai char panch call. to wo mana kar dete hai ki nahi mujhe nahi chahiye. kai baar aisa hota hai lekin aisa nahi hai ki IndiaMART koi galat lead banata hai. galat kyu banayega sir? agar hum galat banayenge to aap IndiaMART pe rahoge? hai na?
Customer: nahi to aise lead aayenge to mai next time kyu judunga mai aapke sath?
Executive: ha. nahi wahi baat hai sir dono ke liye agar galat hoga. agar hum kharab buyer denge to IndiaMART ka bhi kam nahi chalega aur aapka bhi kam nahi chalega. hai na? hum apni taraf se puri koshish karte hai ki sab kuch accha rahe buyer aapse deal kare. hmm.
Customer: nahi meri baat sune madam aapke to ek client ko ek client hum panch jano ko dete hai. to isme kaise pata chalenge ki wo client aapko aapne panch jano ko diye, kaun kaun sa client hai pata chalenge hume?
Executive: aapko sir ye nahi pata chal payega kyuki jab panch log ko mil jata hai to aap dekhe honge sold out ho jati hai lead. aapne dekha hai sold out ho jati hai dikhata hai ki bylead is sold out.
Customer: dekha hai aapne?
Executive: nahi madam maine nahi dekha isme.
Executive: ha to wo aise hi hota hai. jo hamare portal pe bylead hota hai, usme kya hota hai ki ek bylead ko sirf panch log kharid sakte hai. jaise hi panchwa aadmi kharidega, chatta aadmi jab kharidne jayega to usko dikhayega ki ye sold out ho gayi hai, hat gayi hai. waha se hata di jati hai portal ke se. thik hai?
Customer: to is tarah se ek lead ko panch log kharid sakte hai hamare portal pe.
Executive: thik hai sir? aapke portal me ye ye jo jaise bhi ela multani mitti stone ka lead hai 25 kilo ke thik hai? ha. to ye abhi ye kitne jano ko dikhengi?
Executive: agar bylead wali baat kar rahe hai na sir wo dikhengi kai logo ko dikhengi lekin uska naam number sabko nahi dikhega sirf panch log ko dikhega jo log kharidenge usko. uska phone number jo hota hai, main cheez to phone number hota hai na client ka. uska phone number, naam pata. thik hai? to jab us contact by now pe sirf panch log hi click kar payenge aur sirf panch log ko hi uska number aur pata milega. thik hai?
Customer: nahi to ye rehta hai. ab madam 10 lead aap dete ho sakte ki kam se lead badhaiye aise to mujhe mai baat karte customer se kuch customer aise nikal jate hai. maine 10 me se do lead ka prayog kiya hai. thik hai na? aate the abhi thoda saat aath lead mere paas padi hai.
Executive: hmm hmm. aap mujhe bataiye sir mai aapki help karti hu na. aap bataiye ki aap agar 10 log se baat karte hai to kitne log se aap pehle to baat ho jati hai customer se? 10 me se kitne logo se acche se baat chit ho jati hai aapki ye bataiye.
Customer: panch logo se madam acche se baat hoti hai. thik hai na? panch ki to aise ya to call jata hai ya call attend nahi karte. thik hai? call chala jata hai to attend nahi karte. kitne bhi call kar lo do ya do se jyada hum bhi call karte nahi madam kisi ko pareshan karne ke liye.
Executive: nahi nahi sir iska mai aapko samadhan bata dungi ki agar call nahi utha rahe hai to kya karna hai. thik hai? isko bhi mai note kar le rahi hu. abhi mai aapko iske bare me bata dungi. dusri cheez mujhe aap ye bataiye ki jab aap itne log se man lijiye baat kiye. man lijiye ki aapne 10 logo se baat kiya. thik hai? to is 10 logo me se koi chances hota hai ki 10 me se koi ek banda aapse saman kharid le?
Customer: 10 me se hota hai kaise hota hai?
Executive: 10 me se ek banda kharid raha hai aapko. thik hai. to isse aap samajh rahe hai sir aapka jo ratio aa raha hai 10% ka aa raha hai. ki aap 10% logo ko convert kar de rahe ho. to ye to bahut accha hai sir agar dekha jaye to. kyuki market me itne competition ke baad aap 10 log se baat karke ek log ko apna saman de de rahe ho to ye to bahut acchi cheez hai. baki isko hum aur improve kar lenge sir. thoda sa aap time dijiye. thoda sa aap bhi matlab trust kariye IndiaMART pe ki IndiaMART jo aapko provide kar raha hai accha lead de raha hai. aap acche se apne product ko samjhaiye buyer ko. thik hai? to aapko business accha milega.
Customer: thik hai.
Executive: thik hai.
Customer: pure aaj.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received a bad lead.

- Wants to know which clients get the leads.

- Wants more leads.

- Customers not answering calls.



Resolution:

- One buylead reversed.

- Explained how byleads are sold to 5 people.

- Will provide a solution for unanswered calls.

- Explained the customer's 10% conversion rate.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will provide a solution for unanswered calls.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, leads, reverse
